scripts.build:chrome: cp manifest.chrome.json manifest.json && npm run build
scripts.build:firefox: cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -k "npm:watch" "web-ext run --chromium --source-dir . --watch-file sidepanel.html --watch-file sidepanel-loader.js --watch-file sidepanel.css --watch-file sidepanel-partials/** --watch-file sidepanel-styles/** --watch-file extension/**"
scripts.dev:firefox: cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && concurrently -k "npm:watch" "web-ext run --firefox --source-dir . --watch-file sidepanel.html --watch-file sidepanel-loader.js --watch-file sidepanel.css --watch-file sidepanel-partials/** --watch-file sidepanel-styles/** --watch-file extension/**"
